text: Bangerz is the fourth studio album by American singer Miley Cyrus. It was released on September 30, 2013 by RCA Records. Cyrus says the album is "dirty south hip-hop". The album is a change in sound from teen pop and country music Cyrus had played before. She worked with Mike Will Made It and hip hop producers including Pharrell Williams, Oren Yoel, Rami Samir Afuni, Dr. Luke, and Michael McHenry. The album has other people singing with Cyrus. They include Britney Spears, Big Sean, French Montana, Future, Ludacris, and Nelly. ==Critical reception== === Awards === Year Organization Award Result 2014 People's Choice Awards Favorite Album World Music Awards World's Best Album 2015 Grammy Awards Best Pop Vocal Album == References == Category:2013 albums Category:Miley Cyrus albums Category:Pop albums Category:Southern hip hop albums Category:R&B; albums
title: Bangerz
